TopicTitle: What is a .25 or .90 mod that increases vab and sph size?

Articles.Content: I am making a replica of the Saturn v and it needs to be over 100 metres, but I can only fit 80 with the current vab, I know I can build from the bottom up, but then I cannot use the new size thing to make sure it is the right size. If there is not one, then a mod that can change the root part will be fine.

I know this one works fine in 0.25...Not sure about 0.90:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65747-0-24-2-Hangar-Extender-v2-0

And if you need to change the root part, theres this one, that also works fine in 0.25, but not sure about 0.90:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43208-0-24-Jul18-SelectRoot-Set-a-new-root-part-Still-works-in-0-25

And if you need to change the root part, theres this one, that also works fine in 0.25, but not sure about 0.90:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43208-0-24-Jul18-SelectRoot-Set-a-new-root-part-Still-works-in-0-25

that's now stock in 0.90
What do you do to change the root part then?

What do you do to change the root part then?

Use the gizmo furthest to the right.

Oh well, I found a better way to make rockets larger than the vab, just use a couple I beams to build the first stage to the left of the rest of the rocket then move it down to the bottom of the second stage.
